The task requires two types of analysis: linguistic analysis (LA) and information analysis (IA) working in interaction, the latter being, in particular, able to refer to the automatic thesaurus. The ultimate aim of LA is the building of sentence semantic representation (SR). It is important that for each individual sentence its SR Is con-

Linguistic analysis calculates morphological structure for words, syntactic and semantic structures for sentences. Each of these structures is determined by the approprlete language realities; still remaining obscurities can be cleared only by referring to higher levels of analysis. The information model of automatic translation is based on the properties of the coherent text.
